import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from 'axios' import Navbar from './Navbar'; import DisplayError from './DisplayError' import { BrowserRouter as Router } from 'react-router-dom'; function AddProfile(){ const [ profile, setProfile ] = useState({ skills: '', company: '', portfolio: '', linkedIn: '', instagram: '', facebook: '', twitter: '' }) const [ education, setEducation ] = useState({ college: '', degree: '', branch: '', batch: '' }) const [ codingProfile, setCodingProfile ] = useState({ codeforces: '', codechef: '' }) const [ errors, setErrors ] = useState([]) const onSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() try { const res1 = await axios.get(`https://competitive-coding-api.herokuapp.com/api/codeforces/${codingProfile.codeforces}`) const res2 = await axios.get(`https://competitive-coding-api.herokuapp.com/api/codechef/${codingProfile.codechef}`) if(res1.data.status==='Failed'){ errors.unshift({ msg:'Please enter valid codeforces username' }) return setErrors(errors) } if(res2.data.status==='Failed'){ errors.unshift({ msg:'Please enter valid codechef username' }) setErrors(errors) } console.log(res1.data.status) console.log(res2.data.status) } catch( error ) { console.log(error) } } return (

My account

{ errors.length!==0 && errors.forEach((error) => ) }
onSubmit(e) } >

setEducation({...education, college: e.target.value}) } />

setEducation({...education, branch: e.target.value}) } />

) } export default AddProfile;
